title: Can I play pbe in game center ?
body: I read in a law that I can not play in many places but I don't have a computer so I just only play at game center. pls

replies.body: I don't know anything about this law, you should be able to sign up for the PBE and download the client [here ](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/pbe)if eligible.  If you want to play it at a game center, your best bet is to ask the administrators there if it's okay.
